cast.name: 马蒂·里斯蒂宁 Matti Ristinen
米莫萨·维拉莫 Mimosa Willamo

introduction: The series is set against the backdrop of the titular picturesque Finnish coastal town. It revolves around the enigmatic character of Ruben Waara, here portrayed by Matti Ristinen (King of Hearts). A charismatic but somewhat aimless bachelor who recently turned 50, Ruben sells his company and returns to his hometown for the summer. Things take a turn when Ruben’s estranged daughter Vera (Mimosa Willamo), a dedicated police officer in Hanko, finds herself entangled in a murder investigation on the very day of Ruben’s arrival.
